25: dialog raccot I've been waiting for you, Tux. We meet again at last!
dialog tux Raccot the yeti! I should have known it was you!
dialog raccot You may have discovered my evil plan, my old nemesis, but you will not stop me!
dialog raccot When we last met, I was but a Snow-day school bully. Now, I am the Snow King!
